metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20240 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In sOpAllowSystemRestrictionBypass of AppOpsManager.java, there is a possible leak of location information due to a missing permission check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-12 Android-12LAndroid ID: A-231496105

criterions.comment: android-framework-23: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
android-platform-frameworks-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
